attributes.action: Demand government bring in TweetiePie's Law, to Protect and provide vetinary treatment and care for animals / birds in schools, educational facilities
attributes.additional_details:
Demand the government bring in " TweetiePie's Law ", to protect and provide vetinary treatment and care for animals / birds in schools, educational facilities, etc....

TweetiePie was a Chick whom only had four days of life, 20th to 24th March 2014, neglected in a local school.

TweetiePie died alone and uncared for, on the 24th March 2014.

It must be made compulsory for all schools, educational facilities, all locations, etc.., in which animals / birds are brought in, or are reared / raised inhouse, to have RSPCA, or reputable independent vets carry out health check visits, administer treatment, to prevent such situations and such suffering as TweetiePie had been the victim of, from happening in future.

Do not allow TweetiePie's death to have been for nothing
